<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>rm_story</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="rm_story">product=ee5d938e93377150074bbea74dba108d^stateCHANGESTO-8^u_no_test=false^EQ<item display_table="cmdb_model" display_value="ServiceNow" endquery="false" field="product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="ee5d938e93377150074bbea74dba108d"/><item display_value="Testing" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="-8"/><item endquery="false" field="u_no_test" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="false"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Require Tests on Testing</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {


if(current.u_no_test == false){
	var test = new GlideRecord('task_rel_kb');
	test.addQuery('parent', current.sys_id.toString());
	test.query();
	if(!test.next()){
		gs.addErrorMessage('No tests are attached. Please add a test or mark the story as not needing any tests.');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-23 14:42:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cd44f4c0fb5c1650a1e2f3c3beefdc7f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Require Tests on Testing</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cd44f4c0fb5c1650a1e2f3c3beefdc7f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-23 14:43:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cd44f4c0fb5c1650a1e2f3c3beefdc7f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>rm_story</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="rm_story">product=ee5d938e93377150074bbea74dba108d^stateCHANGESTO-7^ORstateCHANGESTO-8^u_no_update_sets=false^EQ<item display_table="cmdb_model" display_value="ServiceNow" endquery="false" field="product" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="ee5d938e93377150074bbea74dba108d"/><item display_value="Ready for testing" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="-7"/><item display_value="Testing" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="-8"/><item endquery="false" field="u_no_update_sets" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="false"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Require Update Set on Ready for Testing</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

if(current.u_no_update_sets == false){
	var update_set = new GlideRecord('u_m2m_u_dev_updat_rm_story');
	update_set.addQuery('u_rm_story', current.sys_id.toString());
	update_set.query();
	if(!update_set.next()){
		gs.addErrorMessage('No update sets attached. Please add update sets or mark the story as not having any update sets.');
		gs.addInfoMessage('Please attach any XML files that will be needed for deployment.');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-23 14:26:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>babf608cfb1c1650a1e2f3c3beefdcfc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Require Update Set on Ready for Testing</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_babf608cfb1c1650a1e2f3c3beefdcfc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-23 14:43:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=babf608cfb1c1650a1e2f3c3beefdcfc"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>samurai_get_agile_tests</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript( /* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
    /* Optional EmailOutbound */
    email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
    /* Optional GlideRecord */
    event) {

    var text = '';
	var sys_id = current.sys_id.toString();

    var kb_rel = new GlideRecord('task_rel_kb');
    kb_rel.addQuery('parent', sys_id);
    kb_rel.query();
    if (kb_rel.next()) {
        var kb = new GlideRecord('kb_knowledge');
        kb.get(kb_rel.child.sys_id.toString());
        if (kb) {
            text = kb.text;
        } else {
            text = 'No test steps found. Please contact the developer with any questions surrounding testing.';
        }
    } else {
        text = 'No test steps found. Please contact the developer with any questions surrounding testing.';

    }
    template.print(text);

})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-26 13:43:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>d732cc05fb9c1a50a1e2f3c3beefdcf2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>samurai_get_agile_tests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_d732cc05fb9c1a50a1e2f3c3beefdcf2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-26 14:17:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c330ff49fb0c1a10a1e2f3c3beefdcf5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SAMURAIUpdateSetUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SAMURAIUpdateSetUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var SAMURAIUpdateSetUtil = Class.create();
SAMURAIUpdateSetUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(UpdateSetAjax, {
    initialize: function() {
        global.UpdateSetAjax.prototype.initialize.call(this);
    },

    retrieveUpdateSets: function(remote_sys_id) {
        var worker = new GlideUpdateSetWorker();
        var sys_id = remote_sys_id;
        worker.setUpdateSourceSysId(sys_id);
        worker.setBackground(true);
        worker.start();
        var progress_id = worker.getProgressID();
        return progress_id;
    },

    type: 'SAMURAIUpdateSetUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-14 20:47:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>c330ff49fb0c1a10a1e2f3c3beefdcf5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SAMURAIUpdateSetUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c330ff49fb0c1a10a1e2f3c3beefdcf5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-14 20:47:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>update_set_problems</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(/* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
          /* Optional EmailOutbound */ email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
          /* Optional GlideRecord */ event) {

var issue = new GlideRecord('sys_update_preview_problem');
issue.addQuery('remote_update_set', current.sys_id.toString());
issue.query();
if(issue.hasNext()){
	template.print(issue.getRowCount() + ' Issues found in this update set.')
}
else{
	template.print('No Issues found in this update set. No action is needed.');
}

})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-14 22:22:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>0b764455fb8c1a10a1e2f3c3beefdc55</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>update_set_problems</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_0b764455fb8c1a10a1e2f3c3beefdc55</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>westonwilson08@gmail.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-14 22:26:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
truetruetruec97d83137f4432005f58108c3ffa917arm_storystateCHANGESTO-7^product=ee5d938e93377150074bbea74dba108d^EQtext/html 

 

]]>falsefalseactivate.life.cycle.migrationfalsefalsefalsefalseenginefalseevent.parm1falseHello, 

Development work has been completed for ${URI_REF}. 

Peer review is now needed. Please assign a peer reviewer and complete the peer review process:

  • Check the update set for excessive or missing items, delete records, etc. 
  • Validate that any flows and workflows are published
  • Test the end-to-end process if possible
  • Ensure best practices are being followed for platform usage and code development
  • Validate that scripts do not contain any unnecessary log statements
]]>SAMURAI - Story Peer Reviewfalse100falseassigned_tofalse

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_update_set</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_update_set">u_deployedCHANGESTOtrue^base_update_setISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_deployed" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="true"/><item endquery="false" field="base_update_set" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Child Set Deployed</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var child_set = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
	child_set.addQuery('base_update_set', current.sys_id.toString()).addOrCondition('parent', current.sys_id.toString());
	child_set.addQuery('u_deployed', 'false');
	child_set.query();

	while(child_set.next()){
		child_set.u_deployed = 'true';
		child_set.update();
	}
